DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is: to develop a comprehensive biochemical assay for detection of Pompe disease (glycogen storage disease type II), to be implemented in the Newborn screening program among the Israeli population.
DOC.brief_title: Screening for Early Detection and Prevention of Pompe Disease in Israel Using Tandem Mass Spectrometry
DOC.criteria: New born babies born during the study period Premature babies
DOC.keyword: To establish the control mean values of alpha glucosidase activity in Dry blood spots of Newborn babies from Israel.
To include the alpha glucosidase assay in the newborn screening program in Israel
